attributes.action: Include time spent on Tier-2 ICT for Tier-2 Skilled workers while applying ILR
attributes.additional_details:
Migration Advisory Committee (MAC) Recommendations:

15. The ICT route should be a route to settlement, without the need to switch to other routes to obtain settlement. Time spent on the ICT visa should also count towards settlement if the worker does switch into another route.”
attributes.background:
As a recommendation made by MAC on the Oct 2021 report, the Government should consider the time spent on the tier 2 ICT by the skilled worker visa holder while applying for ILR.
